--- In junit@y..., "numbsafari" <numbsafari@y...> wrote:
> Another idea would be to update the FAQ so that this particular 
> problem could be more readily associated with the FAQ that provides 
> the answer.
> 
> Right now the title is: "I get a ClassNotFoundException when I use 
> the LoadingTestRunner".
> 
> The title should be: "Why do I am I having problems with Third Party 
> JAR files (ClassNotFoundException/LinkageError)?" Or something 
> similar. Neither qingfenglin or myself received a 
> ClassNotFoundException, we received LinkageError's....
> 

Good point.  The new FAQ will be more clear on this common problem.

> Actually, I don't mean to be a critic, but the documentation for 
> J/Unit really sucks. I know, I know... if I don't like it I should do 
> better... Well, I've only been using J/Unit for a couple of days now 
> so I'm not prepared yet to write docs. As I get more involved with it 
> I definately plan on putting together a couple of HOWTO's.. until 
> then, I'd just like to say that the docs are horrible. Great product 
> (from what I've seen so far), horrible documentation.
>

We're working on making the FAQ better.  The fact that I'm digging
through the archives for these nuggets says something.

You can help by asking (and answering) questions on this list, and
proposing FAQ changes such as you did above.

Thanks!

Mike
